fields.description:
Hi,

I'm trying to use Tableviews inside a ScrollableView. But when adding more than three views to a ScrollableView, the first two added TableViews do no longer contain any data/rows. They get lost.

This was working in Mobile SDK 1.6.1 but is broken in Version 1.7.0 HEAD (r87b34a73)
Very simple reproduceable example: http://www.pastie.org/1882791

Maybe it is caused by the work on ScrollableView / Leak management ?https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commits/master/iphone/Classes/TiUIScrollableViewProxy.m â€” Jicks Steen
fields.summary: iOS Regression 1.7.0: Using more than 3 Views inside a ScrollableView ends in blank Tableviews
fields.environment: Mac OS X 10.6.7, Nightly Build Titanium 1.7.0 (r87b34a73), Xcode 4.0.1, iOS Simulator 4.3 (238.2)

comments.body:
Please include a link to the Q&A question that you asked before you raised this ticket, as is required before raising any ticket. Thank you.

User-specific issue. Marking resolved/invalid.

@Paul I don't understand. What does a "User-specific issue" mean? It was working in 1.6.1 and I think it is a common use case.

Did you only close it as invalid cause of the missing link or will it not be fixed and I have to find a workaround?

Jicks - this is not the place for a long discussion. If my answer in the Q&A did not assist you (have you tried it?), please respond to it there. Please also note my advice about how to create a quality usecase.
